name: shopandsave.com
tag_list: designer-sample-sales, online-desigenr-sample-sale, online-sale, desigenr-clothing-sale, true-religion-jeans-sale, rock-and-republic-sale, denim-sale, denim-jeans-clothing-sale
overview:
About Shopandsave

Shopandsave brings the thrill back to shopping through exclusive, online sales and limited time events. We are proud to be to offer the largest selection of premium denim and designer clothing online. We offer fashion brands to create the most exclusive online sale events by offering up to 80% off retail prices.

Each day shopandsave partners with upscale partners offering insider access to the highest quality merchandise. As a result, we’re able to deliver a wider selection of the latest styles at deeply discounted prices to our members.
